text: @realDonaldTrump Trump votes by mail! THE MILITARY VOTES BY MAIL; do why not the rest of the people? The  USPS workers are ESSENTIAL workers so why not provide COVID19 relief funds DIRECTLY FROM CONGRESS TO THE USPS so relief can be given to this ONLY BUSINESS MENTIONED IN THE CONSTITUTION?
